ch0129_00_higana/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was just thinking about you.
ch0129_00_higana/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m curious to see what you accomplish here
on Pasio...
ch0129_00_higana/0601_0701_01_10:
Pasio’s full of all sorts of people, huh?
Champions, Gym Leaders, and the like.
ch0129_00_higana/0601_0701_02_10:
But just because someone’s got a sparkling
job title doesn’t mean they can’t be beat.
ch0129_00_higana/0601_0701_03_10:
This world’s got so much potential... Anyone can
push their way to the top if they put their mind
to it.
ch0129_00_higana/0601_0701_04_10:
Haha! Whatever, right? Just ignore me and my
philosophical rambling for now, and have some
fun watching your story unfold!
ch0129_00_higana/0601_0702_01_10:
You and your Pokémon should tell me your story
sometime. I’d love to hear it.
ch0129_00_higana/0601_0702_02_10:
You’d better let me be part of your adventure at
some point, too, OK? Don’t leave me hanging!
ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_01_10:
Who am I? Who am I, really? It’s a question
everyone probably asks themselves at some point
in their life.
ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_02_10: It’s definitely something I had to ask myself once.
ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_03_10:
I spent some time in the Hoenn region, and the
people I met there helped me sort of discover
who I am.
ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_04_10:
It’s thanks to them that I’m able to answer that
question now.
ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_05_10:
So, y’know, I can say that I’m Zinnia, and my
partner is Rayquaza.
ch0129_00_higana/0602_0702_01_10:
Think you’ll ever meet someone who totally turns
your world upside down?
ch0129_00_higana/0602_0702_02_10: What if that were me? Ahaha!
ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_01_10:
Ever since I was a little girl, I’ve always turned
my eyes up to the sky.
ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_02_10:
No matter how uncertain or grief-stricken or
alone I felt, I turned and looked up there...
so that my tears would never, ever fall.
ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_03_10:
Looking up at the sky brings back a lot of
memories for me.
ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_04_10:
The people I met back in Hoenn, the Pokémon
I encountered...
ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_05_10: Guess I’ve been through a lot! Heh...
ch0129_00_higana/0603_0702_01_10:
What about you? Do you ever do that sort
of thing?
ch0129_00_higana/0603_0702_02_10: We should go stargazing sometime, me and you.
ch0129_00_higana/0603_0702_03_10:
We can get lost in our thoughts on infinite
universes and galaxies far away.
ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_01_10:
Do you have someone or something you’d want
to protect at all costs? Something greater
than yourself?
ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_02_10: If the answer is yes, you should remember this...
ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_03_10:
Try not to take things for granted—especially the
things you really care about.
ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_04_10:
You never know... One day, they could suddenly
disappear, lost forever.
ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_05_10:
I mean, it’s your job to make sure nothing like
that ever happens, but you can’t be too careful.
ch0129_00_higana/0604_0702_01_10:
They say you can never truly know how much
something means to you until it’s gone.
ch0129_00_higana/0604_0702_02_10:
I wonder if we even realize how much we love
the things we want to protect.
ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_01_10:
If you had to make a sacrifice in order to protect
something or someone, what would you do,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_02_10:
Would you take a step back, and just see what
happens? Let everything play out?
ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_03_10:
Or would you jump in and try to do something
about it, even if it meant making a sacrifice?
ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_04_10:
No... You probably wouldn’t settle for either of
those options, would you?
ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_05_10:
You’d probably try to figure out a way to save
everyone and everything you could, huh?
ch0129_00_higana/0605_0702_01_10:
With all of the different people and Pokémon you
interact with, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0129_00_higana/0605_0702_02_10:
I bet your list of precious things you’d give
everything to protect gets longer every day.
ch0129_00_higana/1701_0701_01_10:
Niiice! Full points to you for being at the
right place at the right time!
ch0129_00_higana/1701_0701_02_10: Here, have a reward to celebrate!
ch0129_00_higana/1701_0702_01_10:
May you treasure this precious gift that I have
bestowed upon you until the end of your days...
ch0129_00_higana/1701_0702_02_10:
Haha! I’m kidding, I’m kidding. It’s all yours.
Use it however you like!
ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_01_10:
While I was traveling through the Hoenn region,
I had a Whismur as my partner. Her name’s Aster.
ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_02_10:
She’s so darned adorable—especially the way she
likes to nuzzle up against me and make the cutest
little noises.
ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_03_10:
Aster and I were always together...in good times
and in bad.
ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_04_10:
While we were in Hoenn, we were kind of like
a sync pair in that way.
ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_05_10:
If she hadn’t stuck with me through that journey,
I don’t know if I’d be where I am today.
ch0129_00_higana/2501_0702_01_10:
We can’t go through our lives alone, and neither
can Pokémon. We need each other.
ch0129_00_higana/2501_0702_02_10:
Buuuut! You’ve got plenty of imagination, right?
I’m sure you know that without me having to
tell you.
ch0129_00_higana/2511_0701_01_10:
When I’m around you, I sometimes get this really
warm, nostalgic feeling.
ch0129_00_higana/2511_0701_02_10:
I think it’s a good thing, though. It tells me that
I have a friend around that I can really trust.
ch0129_00_higana/2511_0701_03_10:
Thanks to you, I think I’ll be able to forge a new
beginning. Turns out my story’s not over after all.
ch0129_00_higana/2511_0701_04_10:
It could be interesting...trying to imagine how it’ll
all unfurl now that I’ve teamed up with you.
ch0129_00_higana/2511_0702_01_10:
How do you think our story’ll turn out in the end?
I’d be curious to hear your theories sometime.
ch0129_00_higana/3001_0701_01_10:
Gooood morning! Hope you slept well.
No time to dawdle today!
ch0129_00_higana/3002_0701_01_10:
Hmm... Let’s try to guess what kind of
adventures are in store for us today.
C’mon, use your imagination!
ch0129_00_higana/3003_0701_01_10:
I wonder what it’d be like to just relaaax and
do nothing for a day... Sounds kinda nice.
ch0129_00_higana/3004_0701_01_10:
The sky is always the same, no matter where
you are... Wait, that’s not right. It’s actually
pretty different.
ch0129_00_higana/3005_0701_01_10:
The stars are so beautiful tonight. Reminds me of
when I... Ahem. Sooo, how was your day?
ch0129_00_higana/3006_0701_01_10:
Wow, I can’t believe it’s already this late!
Maybe we should leave things here for today
and get some rest.
